transcript_chunks.text: I would hope that you take the time and go all right let's put out let's go let's put out a remake maybe if it is like a um brilliant Diamond shining Pearl type remake that was like a smaller cuty sort of thing let's put out those in the meantime and for the next big Pokemon game let's at the very least try to release it not broken because that is damaging the IP like Pokemon Pokemon has come out over the years and I've had titles that people weren't like the happiest with right like I played Pokemon sword and shield and I was like all right cool it's another Pokemon like that happened the way scarlet and violet happened it's like that you are damaging the brand like that is bad like that is a bad thing to happen in Pokemon now we're our eyes on this next thing to see if it's actually GNA work or not
